MUNICIPAL CODE OF OCONOMOWOC, WISCONSIN 
____________ 
Original 1978 Code 
Published by Order of the Common Council 
Supplement Service Commencing in 1993 by MuniCode 
Republished in 2003 
____________ 

ORDINANCE NO. 17-O910 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
    WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
    WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #16-O895, dated June 21, 2016, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
    WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by 66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on December 29, 2016 in the Oconomowoc Focus. This being "Supplement #24" to our republished Code. 
    NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
    SECTION 1. The Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the General Ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
    SECTION 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication as provided by law. 
DATED: February 7, 2017 
CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
/s/   
      David Nold, Mayor   ATTEST: 
/s/   
      Diane Coenen, Clerk   Date Adopted: February 7, 2017 
Date Published: February 16, 2017 
Effective Date: February 17, 2017 
ORDINANCE NO. 16-O894 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
    WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
    WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #15-0886, dated December 1, 2015, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
    WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by 66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on May 3, 2016 in the Oconomowoc Focus. This being "Supplement #23" to our republished Code. 
    Now THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
    SECTION 1. The Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the General Ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
    SECTION 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication as provided by law. 
DATED: June 7, 2016 
CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
/s/   
      David Nold, Mayor   ATTEST: 
/s/   
      Diane Coenen, Clerk   Date Adopted: June 7, 2016 
Date Published: June 16, 2016 
Effective Date: June 17, 2016 
ORDINANCE NO. 15-O878 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
    WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
    WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #15-O875, dated May 5, 2015, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
    WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by 66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on September 17, 2015 in the Oconomowoc Focus. This being "Supplement #22" to our republished Code. 
    NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
    SECTION 1. The Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the General Ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
    SECTION 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication as provided by law. 
DATED: October 20, 2015 
CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
/s/   
      David Nold, Mayor   ATTEST: 
/s/   
      Diane Coenen, Clerk   Date Adopted: October 20, 2015 
Date Published: October 29, 2015 
Effective Date: October 30, 2015 
Ordinance No. 15-O875 
An Ordinance to Amend the General Ordinances 
of the City of Oconomowoc 
    Whereas, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
    Whereas, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #14-0871, dated December 16, 2014, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
    Whereas, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by 66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on March 12, 2015 in the Oconomowoc Enterprise. This being "Supplement #21" to our republished Code. 
    Now Therefore, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
    Section 1. The Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the General Ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
    Section 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication as provided by law. 
DATED: May 5, 2015 
CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
/s/   
      James Daley, Mayor   ATTEST: 
/s/   
      Diane Coenen, Clerk   Date Adopted: May 5, 2015 
Date Published: May 14, 2015 
Effective Date: May 15, 2015

Ordinance No. 14-0855 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #13-O849, dated November 19, 2013, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by 66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on March 13, 2014 in the Oconomowoc Enterprise. This being "Supplement #19" to our republished Code. 
NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
SECTION 1. The Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the General Ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
SECTION 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law. 
Dated: April 15, 2014 
CITY OF OCONOMOWOC  
/s/   
      James Daley, Mayor   ATTEST: 
/s/   
      Diane Coenen, Clerk   Date Adopted: April 15, 2014 
Date Published: April 24, 2014 
Effective Date: April 25, 2015 
Ordinance No. 13-0849 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #13-O845, dated June 18, 2013, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by 66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on October 17, 2013 in the Oconomowoc Enterprise. This being "Supplement #18" to our republished Code. 
NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
SECTION 1. The Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the General Ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
SECTION 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law. 
Dated: November 19, 2013 
CITY OF OCONOMOWOC  
  
      James Daley, Mayor   ATTEST: 
      Diane Coenen, Clerk   Date Adopted: November 19, 2013 
Date Published: November 28, 2013 
Effective Date: November 29, 2013

Ordinance No. 12-O832 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #11-O813, dated December 20, 2011, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by §66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on July 24, 2012 in the Oconomowoc Focus. This being "Supplement #16" to our republished Code. 
NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. The Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the General Ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law. 
Dated: August 21, 2012 
CITY OF OCONOMOWOC  
  
      James Daley, Mayor   ATTEST: 
  
      Diane Coenen, Clerk   Date adopted: August 21, 2012 
Date published: August 30, 2012 
Effective date: August 31, 2012

AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC

NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. The Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the General Ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin.

Ordinance No. 11-O803 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #10-O788, dated December 17, 2010, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by §66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on June 9, 2011 in the Oconomowoc Focus. This being "Supplement #14" to our republished Code. 
NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. That the Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law. 
Dated: July 5, 2011 
CITY OF OCONOMOWOC  
  
      James Daley, Mayor   ATTEST: 
  
      Diane Coenen, City Clerk   Date adopted: July 5, 2011

NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. That the Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law.

AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC

WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #08-O736, dated December 16, 2008, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and

NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. That the Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law.

Ordinance No. 05-O646 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #05-O632, dated June 21, 2005, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by §66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on November 7, 2005 in the Focus. This being Supplement #5 to our republished code. 
NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. That the Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law.

Ordinance No. 05-O631 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #04-O616, dated December 21, 2004, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by §66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on April 21, 2005 in the Oconomowoc Enterprise. This being Supplement #4 to our republished code. 
NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. That the Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law. 
Dated: June 7, 2005 
  
      Maury Sullivan, Mayor   ATTEST: 
  
/s/ Ardyce Senfleben 
      City Clerk   Date adopted: 6/7/05 
Date published: 6/14/05

Ordinance No. 04-O607 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #04-O603, dated June 1, 2004, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by 66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on September 2, 2004 in the Oconomowoc Enterprise. This being Supplement #3 to our republished code. 
NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. That the Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law. 
Dated: October 5, 2004 
  
      Maury Sullivan, Mayor   ATTEST: 
  
/s/ Ardyce Senfleben 
      City Clerk   Date adopted: 10/5/04 
Date published: 10/14/04 
Effective date: 10/15/04 
Ordinance No. 04-0599 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up to date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #03-0585, dated December 16, 2003, and Ordinance #02-0543, and changes necessitated by changes in State Law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by 66.0103 Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on February 26, 2004 in the Oconomowoc Focus. This being "Supplement #2" to our republished Code. 
NOW THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. That the Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This Ordinance shall take effect after passage and publication, as provided by law. 
Dated: April 6, 2004 
  
      Gary Kohlenberg, Mayor   ATTEST: 
  
/s/ Ardyce Senfleben 
      City Clerk   Date adopted: 4/5/04 
Date published: 4/12/04 
Effective date: 4/13/04

      City Clerk   Date adopted: 4/16/02 
Date published: 4/25/02 
Effective date: 4/26/02 
This ordinance was adopted by the Common [Council] on April 16, 2002. Mayor Gary Kohlenberg became Mayor of the City on April 16, 2002, and should approve this legislation. Pursuant to §62.09(8)(c), Wis. Stats., Mayor Kohlenberg has had the opportunity to approve or disapprove. As Clerk of the City of Oconomowoc, I certify that the Mayor has not approved or disapproved within five days, or later, and accordingly this action by the Common Council and this legislation is in force 
/s/ Ardyce Senfleben 
      City Clerk 
      5/16/02   Ordinance No. 01-0511

ORDINANCE NO. 92-0300 
AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC, WISCONSIN 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc be brought up-to-date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance #92-0295, dated June 16, 1992, and changes necessitated by changes in State law have now been incorporated into the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended Code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by §66.035, Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication on September 16, 1992, in The Oconomowoc Enterprise; 
NOW, THEREFORE, the City Council of the City of Oconomowoc do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. That the Code of Ordinances in book form entitled, "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin," as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This ordinance shall take effect the day after passage and publication as provided by law. 
/s/ Marlene M. Schumacher 
      Marlene M. Schumacher, Mayor   ATTEST: 
/s/ Ardyce Senfleben 
      City Clerk   Date Adopted: October 20, 1992 
Date Published: October 28, 1992 
Effective Date: October 29, 1992

AN ORDINANCE TO AMEND THE GENERAL ORDINANCES 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC, WISCONSIN 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin, be brought up to date; and 
WHEREAS, ordinances adopted through Ordinance dated May 22, 1979, and changes necessitated by changes in State law have now been incorporated in the Municipal Code; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such amended Code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than 2 weeks, as required by Section 66.035, Wisconsin Statutes; 
NOW, THEREFORE, the Common Council of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin, do ordain as follows: 
Section 1. That the Code of Ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin", as amended, shall be and hereby is adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. This ordinance shall take effect the day after passage and publication as provided by law. 
/s/ Florence Whalen 
      Mayor   ATTEST: 
/s/ Gary L. Rasmussen 
      Clerk   Date Adopted: 8-21-79 
Date Published: 8-30-79 
Effective Date: 8-30-79 
ORDINANCE NO. ____________ 
AN ORDINANCE TO CODIFY THE GENERAL ORDINANCE 
OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC, WISCONSIN. 
WHEREAS, it is deemed expedient and necessary that the general ordinance of the City of Oconomowoc be revised, codified and arranged in appropriate chapters, sections and subsections; that omissions be supplied, defects be amended and new ordinances be enacted; and that the same be published in book form to make the whole thereof plain, concise, intelligible and convenient; and 
WHEREAS, on April 7, 1971, the City Council authorized the preparation of a code of general ordinances for the City; and 
WHEREAS, a copy of such code has been on file and open for public inspection in the office of the City Clerk for not less than two weeks, as required by §66.035, Wis. Stats., and notice thereof was given by publication February 16 and 23, 1978, in Oconomowoc Enterprise; 
NOW, THEREFORE, THE COMMON COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF OCONOMOWOC DO ORDAIN AS FOLLOWS: 
Section 1. That the code of ordinances in book form entitled "Municipal Code of the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin," a copy of which is on file in the office of the City Clerk for public inspection, shall be and is hereby adopted as the general ordinances in and for the City of Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. 
Section 2. Section 25.05 of the municipal code of the City of Oconomowoc does not apply to any ordinance duly passed and adopted since October 1, 1977. 
Section 3. This ordinance shall take effect the day after passage and publication as provided by law. 
/s/ Florence Whalen 
      Mayor   Adopted: 3-21-78 
Approved: 3-21-78 
Published: 3-30-78 
ATTEST: 
/s/ Alice L. Bergman 
      City Clerk   
SUPPLEMENT HISTORY TABLE 
    The table below allows users of this Code to quickly and accurately determine what ordinances have been considered for codification in each supplement. Ordinances that are of a general and permanent nature are codified in the Code Book and are considered "Included." Ordinances that are not of a general and permanent nature are not codified in the Code Book and are considered "Omitted." 
    In addition, by adding to this table with each supplement, users of this Municipal Code will be able to gain a more complete picture of the Code's historical evolution.

FORM OF GOVERNMENT 

1.01 - MAYOR-COUNCIL PLAN. 
The City of Oconomowoc shall be organized and governed under the provisions of Ch. 62, Wis. Stats., known as Mayor-Council plan. 
GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICIALS 

1.02 - ELECTED OFFICIALS. (Am. #89-0230) 
(1)  ENUMERATED. The elected officials of the City shall be a Mayor, 2 aldermen from each aldermanic district and a Municipal Judge. 
(2)  TERMS. 
(a)  Mayor . The Mayor shall be elected in the spring election of each even numbered year for a term of 2 years. 
(b)  Aldermen . One alderman shall be elected from each aldermanic district each spring for a term of 2 years. 
(c)  Municipal Judge . See §1.25 of this chapter. 
(3)  TIME OF TAKING OFFICE. The regular terms of the Mayor and aldermen shall commence on the third Tuesday in April succeeding their election. The regular terms of all other officials shall commence on May 1 following their election or appointment, unless otherwise provided. 
1.03 - APPOINTED OFFICIALS. 
(1)  TENURED OFFICIALS. The following officials shall be appointed by the Mayor in writing, subject to confirmation by the Council and, after a one year probationary period, shall become tenured officials of the City pursuant to the charter ordinance dated 6/15/72, and may only be removed for cause as provided in §1.05(2): 
Administrator-Treasurer 
Assessor 
Clerk 
Engineer 
Public Works, Director of 
Director of Parks and Recreation (Am. #85-0154) 
(2)  NONTENURED OFFICIALS. (Am. #92-0289; #96-0366; #17-O912) The following officials shall be appointed in the manner and for the term indicated: 
Official How Appointed Term Attorney Mayor, subject to conf. by the Council 1 year Assistant City Attorney Mayor, subject to conf. by the Common Council 1 year Comptroller Mayor, subject to conf. by the Council 1 year Director of Public Safety Police and Fire Commission Indefinite Emergency Government Director Mayor, subject to conf. by the Council 1 year Fire Chief Police and Fire Commission.
